textContent:
How frequently do I want people using Spells? 
Should they be part of a serious rotation? (YES) 
How lacking is a Trick-only Build? (A LOT)
How should serious content be balanced? (Lean to hard difficulties, make Spell usage almost mandatory) If someone manages to clear difficult content without Spells award them with something special.

Spells that are supposed to be part of a rotation have a very low mana cost. Spells that are moderate CDs (up to 10 minutes or so) have a larger cost.
Super-Spells (BIG CDs, like hours or a day) have a way larger cost, and might even include both % and flat cost.
title: Balance Tricks and Spells
textContentHtml:
How frequently do I want people using Spells? 

Should they be part of a serious rotation? (YES) 

How lacking is a Trick-only Build? (A LOT)

How should serious content be balanced? (Lean to hard difficulties, make Spell usage almost mandatory) If someone manages to clear difficult content without Spells award them with something special.


Spells that are supposed to be part of a rotation have a very low mana cost. Spells that are moderate CDs (up to 10 minutes or so) have a larger cost.

Super-Spells (BIG CDs, like hours or a day) have a way larger cost, and might even include both % and flat cost.
